sprint_goal: Establish the core secure transformation engine backend and its foundational security model, including the Jint service, sandbox constraints, violation logging, and job isolation.
key_deliverables: Functional ITransformationService; Configurable Jint Sandbox; Security violation logging; Job failure handling.
demo_objectives: Demonstrate a script transformation via an integration test; Show a timeout violation being caught and logged; Show a CLR access attempt being blocked.
success_criteria: All unit and integration tests for stories WI-001, WI-002, WI-003, WI-004 are passing. Security review of sandbox implementation is complete.
risk_factors: Uncertainty in Jint library's performance and security features.
mitigation_strategies: Prioritize development of targeted unit tests for each sandbox constraint early in the sprint.
burndown_target: Complete 39 hours by end of week 1.

sprint_goal: Implement the complete backend infrastructure for managing transformation scripts, including database schema, encryption, and a full CRUD API, plus the core data pipeline guards.
epic_coverage: Transformation Script Management & Versioning, Data Handling & Processing Pipeline
key_deliverables: EF Core schema for scripts/versions; Script encryption service; RESTful API for script CRUD; Data buffering and size limit enforcement.
demo_objectives: Demonstrate creating a script via API; Show script content is encrypted in the DB; Demo API rejecting a dataset larger than a test limit.
success_criteria: All integration tests for Script CRUD API are passing. Data size limit enforcement is verified. Encryption is verified.
risk_factors: Complexity of DPAPI key management in different environments.
mitigation_strategies: Follow Microsoft best practices for DPAPI and document environment setup clearly.
burndown_target: Complete 42 hours by end of week 1.

sprint_goal: Develop the core frontend UI for script management, including the Monaco Editor integration, and build the backend API for the script preview functionality.
epic_coverage: Transformation Script Management & Versioning, Transformation Preview & Testing
key_deliverables: Script list page with CRUD actions; Script editor page with Monaco Editor; Backend `/transformations/preview` API endpoint.
demo_objectives: Show the list of scripts; Demonstrate creating a new script in the Monaco editor; Preview a script with sample data using the API.
success_criteria: Monaco Editor POC is successful and bundle size impact is understood. E2E tests for script creation are passing. Preview API integration tests are passing.
risk_factors: Monaco Editor integration complexity and potential performance impact on the application bundle size.
mitigation_strategies: Time-box the POC task. Investigate lazy-loading the editor component if bundle size is a major issue.
integration_windows: Frontend/Backend integration for script list and create.
burndown_target: Complete 47 hours by end of week 1.

sprint_goal: Enhance the frontend with script versioning and diffing capabilities, and complete the end-to-end preview workflow including timeouts, structured errors, and live data sources.
epic_coverage: Transformation Script Management & Versioning, Transformation Preview & Testing
key_deliverables: UI for version history, diffing, and reverting; Fully functional 3-pane preview editor with live data and sample data options.
demo_objectives: Demonstrate viewing version history for a script; Show a side-by-side diff of two versions; Preview a script using a live data connector.
success_criteria: E2E tests for versioning and preview workflows are passing. All UI components are accessible.
risk_factors: High capacity utilization for the sprint; potential for spill-over if any task is underestimated.
mitigation_strategies: Prioritize critical path tasks (versioning API, live data preview backend). De-scope less critical UI polish if necessary.
integration_windows: Full frontend/backend integration for all script management and preview features.
burndown_target: Complete 57 hours by end of week 1.

sprint_goal: Implement advanced data handling features, core operational monitoring via Prometheus, and initial compliance and UX enhancements.
epic_coverage: Data Handling & Processing Pipeline, System Operations & Quality, User Experience & Compliance, Deployment & Implementation Lifecycle
key_deliverables: JSON Schema validation service; Prometheus `/metrics` endpoint; System-wide feature flag for transformations; UI performance warning.
demo_objectives: Show a report job failing due to schema validation; View custom transformation metrics in Prometheus; Demonstrate enabling/disabling the feature with the flag.
success_criteria: All integration tests for schema validation and metrics are passing. E2E test for feature flag is passing.
risk_factors: Availability of a Prometheus/Grafana environment for testing.
mitigation_strategies: Use a local Docker-based Prometheus setup for development and CI testing.
burndown_target: Complete 32 hours by end of week 1.

sprint_goal: Finalize operational documentation, build and test the legacy migration script, and prepare for production lifecycle management.
epic_coverage: System Operations & Quality, Deployment & Implementation Lifecycle
key_deliverables: Backup & Recovery runbook; Production cutover plan; Legacy migration script and procedure; Comprehensive feature documentation.
demo_objectives: Walk through the documented DR procedure; Demonstrate a dry-run of the legacy migration script against test data; Review the final OpenAPI specification.
success_criteria: DR test is successfully completed within the RTO. Migration script dry-run is successful. All documentation is peer-reviewed and approved.
risk_factors: Legacy migration complexity is high and may have unforeseen issues.
mitigation_strategies: Perform dry-runs against a full production data snapshot in a staging environment.
burndown_target: Complete 44 hours by end of week 1.

sprint_goal: Implement final compliance features for the audit trail, internationalize error messages, and prepare for legacy system decommissioning.
epic_coverage: Deployment & Implementation Lifecycle, System Operations & Quality, User Experience & Compliance
key_deliverables: Enhanced audit trail with integrity/retention mechanisms; Internationalized error messages; Decommissioning plan and scripts; Administrator training module.
demo_objectives: Show an audit log purge job running; Demonstrate an API error message in a different language using `Accept-Language` header; Review decommissioning plan.
success_criteria: Security review of the audit trail enhancements is complete. All relevant error messages are externalized to resource files.
risk_factors: Proving audit log immutability to compliance standards can be challenging.
mitigation_strategies: Use industry-standard techniques like chained hashing and document the design thoroughly for auditors.
burndown_target: Complete 37 hours by end of week 1.
